solution_line_template: Matt is {fem_current_age} x {matt_age_multiplier} = <<{fem_current_age}*{matt_age_multiplier}={matt_current_age}>>{matt_current_age} years old now.
In {years_in_future} years, Matt will be {matt_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{matt_current_age}+{years_in_future}={matt_age_in_future}>>{matt_age_in_future} years old.
In {years_in_future} years, Fem will be {fem_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{fem_current_age}+{years_in_future}={fem_age_in_future}>>{fem_age_in_future} years old.
So, the sum of their ages in two years is {matt_age_in_future} + {fem_age_in_future} = <<{matt_age_in_future}+{fem_age_in_future}={sum_ages_in_future}>>{sum_ages_in_future} years old.
